item.title: About Me
item.author: shivaswaroop40@gmail.com (Shivaswaroop Nittoor Krishnamurthy)
item.description:
üëã Hello, I’m Shivaswaroop!

I’m a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer and MSc Communication Systems student at KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden. With over 3 years of professional experience in cloud technologies, I specialize in designing, optimizing, and securing large-scale cloud infrastructures.

item.title: Welcome to My Portfolio!
item.author: shivaswaroop40@gmail.com (Shivaswaroop Nittoor Krishnamurthy)
item.description:
Hello and Welcome! üëã

I’m excited to share my journey as a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer and MSc Communication Systems student at KTH Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden.

My Story

From Bengaluru to Stockholm, my path has been driven by a passion for technology and innovation. After completing my Bachelor’s in Telecommunication Engineering, I spent over 3 years working with cloud technologies, helping organizations build better, more efficient infrastructure.
